item.title: The new Headless mode now supports disabling lazy loading
item.description: Recently, support for disabling lazy loading was added to the new headless Chromium.

item.description: I attended BlinkOn9 from April 18 to 19, 2019. Here is the official page: bit.

item.title: Enable to open multiple file-pickers in Chromium for Linux
item.description: Sometimes, we don’t know exact requirements or expect user behaviors while developing or fix something.

item.title: Apple-style-span class was fully removed from Blink
item.description: Finally, Apple-style-span class was fully removed from Blink(commit). Apple-style-span has not been produced since 2011: https://webkit.
